{
  "name": "splice-v3",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Adobe Premiere Pro UXP Plugin with selection tools and AI services integration",
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "type": "module",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "vite",
    "build": "tsc && vite build",
    "preview": "vite preview",
    "test": "vitest",
    "test:ui": "vitest --ui",
    "test:coverage": "vitest run --coverage",
    "test:e2e": "playwright test",
    "test:e2e:ui": "playwright test --ui",
    "test:all": "npm run test && npm run test:e2e",
    "lint": "eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx",
    "lint:fix": "eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx --fix",
    "format": "prettier --write \"src/**/*.{ts,tsx,css}\"",
    "typecheck": "tsc --noEmit",
    "uxp:watch": "uxp plugin watch dist",
    "uxp:load": "uxp plugin load dist/manifest.json",
    "uxp:reload": "uxp plugin reload",
    "uxp:debug": "uxp plugin debug",
    "uxp:package": "uxp plugin package",
    "prepare": "husky"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "adobe",
    "uxp",
    "premiere-pro",
    "plugin",
    "spectrum",
    "typescript"
  ],
  "author": "",
  "license": "UNLICENSED",
  "dependencies": {
    "@spectrum-web-components/action-button": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/button": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/checkbox": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/dialog": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/icons-workflow": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/menu": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/picker": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/progress-circle": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/textfield": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/theme": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/toast": "^0.42.0",
    "lit": "^3.2.1"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@adobe/cc-ext-uxp-types": "^7.3.1",
    "@eslint/js": "^9.39.2",
    "@playwright/test": "^1.49.1",
    "@types/node": "^22.10.2",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^8.18.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^8.18.0",
    "@vitest/coverage-v8": "^2.1.8",
    "@vitest/ui": "^2.1.8",
    "eslint": "^9.17.0",
    "globals": "^15.14.0",
    "husky": "^9.1.7",
    "lint-staged": "^15.2.11",
    "prettier": "^3.4.2",
    "typescript": "^5.7.2",
    "typescript-eslint": "^8.50.0",
    "vite": "^6.0.5",
    "vitest": "^2.1.8"
  },
  "lint-staged": {
    "*.{ts,tsx}": [
      "eslint --fix",
      "prettier --write"
    ],
    "*.{json,md,css}": [
      "prettier --write"
    ]
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=20.0.0"
  }
}

     2‚Üí
     3‚ÜíAdobe Premiere Pro UXP Plugin with selection tools and AI-powered editing features.
     4‚Üí
     5‚Üí## Features
     6‚Üí
     7‚Üí- **Selection Tools**: Advanced clip selection with time range and track selection
     8‚Üí- **AI-Powered Analysis**: Scene detection, smart cut suggestions, audio analysis
     9‚Üí- **Freemium Model**: 10 free AI operations, upgrade for unlimited access
    10‚Üí- **Spectrum Web Components**: Native Adobe design system UI
    11‚Üí
    12‚Üí## Requirements
    13‚Üí
    14‚Üí- Adobe Premiere Pro 25.6+
    15‚Üí- UXP Developer Tool 2.2+
    16‚Üí- Node.js 20+
    17‚Üí
    18‚Üí## Development
    19‚Üí
    20‚Üí```bash
    21‚Üí# Install dependencies
    22‚Üínpm install
    23‚Üí
    24‚Üí# Start development server
    25‚Üínpm run dev
    26‚Üí
    27‚Üí# Run unit tests

    29‚Üí

    42‚Üí
    43‚Üí## Plugin Development
    44‚Üí
    45‚Üí```bash
    46‚Üí# Start UXP Developer Tool service
    47‚Üíuxp service start
    48‚Üí
    49‚Üí# Load plugin
    50‚Üínpm run uxp:load

    52‚Üí# Watch for changes
    53‚Üínpm run uxp:watch
    54‚Üí
    55‚Üí# Debug plugin
    56‚Üínpm run uxp:debug
    57‚Üí
    58‚Üí# Package for distribution
    59‚Üínpm run uxp:package
    60‚Üí```
    61‚Üí
    62‚Üí## Project Structure
    63‚Üí
    64‚Üí```
    65‚Üísplice-v3/
    66‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ src/
    67‚Üí‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ components/     # Lit Web Components
    68‚Üí‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ common/     # Shared UI components
    69‚Üí‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ panels/     # Main plugin panels
    70‚Üí‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ hooks/          # Custom hooks (if using)
    71‚Üí‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ utils/          # Utility functions
    72‚Üí‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ api/        # API wrappers
    73‚Üí‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ helpers/    # Pure helper functions
    74‚Üí‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ types/          # TypeScript type definitions
    75‚Üí‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ context/        # Global context/state
    76‚Üí‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ styles/         # Global CSS & design tokens
    77‚Üí‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ config/         # Plugin configuration
    78‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ tests/
    79‚Üí‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unit/           # Vitest unit tests
    80‚Üí‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ e2e/            # Playwright e2e tests
    81‚Üí‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ __mocks__/      # Test mocks
    82‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ public/
    83‚Üí‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ manifest.json   # UXP plugin manifest
    84‚Üí‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ index.html      # Plugin entry HTML
    85‚Üí‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ icons/          # Plugin icons
    86‚Üí‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ dist/               # Built plugin (generated)
    87‚Üí```
    88‚Üí
    89‚Üí## AI Service Configuration
    90‚Üí
    91‚ÜíConfigure your AI provider in Settings:
    92‚Üí
    93‚Üí- **Anthropic Claude**: Get API key from console.anthropic.com
    94‚Üí- **OpenAI GPT**: Get API key from platform.openai.com
    95‚Üí- **Google Gemini**: Get API key from makersuite.google.com

    97‚Üí## Distribution

    99‚Üí1. Package plugin: `npm run uxp:package`

file.content:
# Splice v3

Adobe Premiere Pro UXP Plugin with selection tools and AI-powered editing features.

## Features

- **Selection Tools**: Advanced clip selection with time range and track selection
- **AI-Powered Analysis**: Scene detection, smart cut suggestions, audio analysis
- **Freemium Model**: 10 free AI operations, upgrade for unlimited access
- **Spectrum Web Components**: Native Adobe design system UI

## Requirements

- Adobe Premiere Pro 25.6+
- UXP Developer Tool 2.2+
- Node.js 20+

## Development

```bash
# Install dependencies
npm install

# Start development server
npm run dev

# Run unit tests
npm test

# Run e2e tests
npm run test:e2e

# Type check
npm run typecheck

# Lint
npm run lint

# Build for production
npm run build
```

## Plugin Development

```bash
# Start UXP Developer Tool service
uxp service start

# Load plugin
npm run uxp:load

# Watch for changes
npm run uxp:watch

# Debug plugin
npm run uxp:debug

# Package for distribution
npm run uxp:package
```

## Project Structure

```
splice-v3/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ src/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ components/     # Lit Web Components
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ common/     # Shared UI components
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ panels/     # Main plugin panels
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ hooks/          # Custom hooks (if using)
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ utils/          # Utility functions
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ api/        # API wrappers
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ helpers/    # Pure helper functions
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ types/          # TypeScript type definitions
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ context/        # Global context/state
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ styles/         # Global CSS & design tokens
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ config/         # Plugin configuration
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ tests/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unit/           # Vitest unit tests
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ e2e/            # Playwright e2e tests
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ __mocks__/      # Test mocks
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ public/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ manifest.json   # UXP plugin manifest
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ index.html      # Plugin entry HTML
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ icons/          # Plugin icons
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ dist/               # Built plugin (generated)
```

## AI Service Configuration

Configure your AI provider in Settings:

- **Anthropic Claude**: Get API key from console.anthropic.com
- **OpenAI GPT**: Get API key from platform.openai.com
- **Google Gemini**: Get API key from makersuite.google.com

## Distribution

1. Package plugin: `npm run uxp:package`
2. Submit to [Adobe Exchange](https://exchange.adobe.com)
3. Follow Adobe's review process

## License

UNLICENSED - Proprietary

content.thinking:
Now I have a good understanding of the project. This is **Splice v3** - an Adobe Premiere Pro UXP Plugin with selection tools and AI-powered editing features. It uses:

- TypeScript with Vite for building
- Lit Web Components for the UI
- Spectrum Web Components (Adobe's design system)
- Vitest for unit testing
- Playwright for e2e testing
- ESLint + Prettier for code quality

The project structure is well organized with:
- `src/components/` - Lit Web Components (panels and common UI)
- `src/utils/` - API wrappers and helpers
- `src/types/` - TypeScript definitions
- `src/styles/` - Global CSS
- `tests/` - Unit and e2e tests

This is a legitimate Adobe plugin project for video editing automation with AI features.

Let me summarize this for the user.

content.text:
I've opened the **Splice v3** repository. Here's an overview:

## Project Summary

**Splice v3** is an Adobe Premiere Pro UXP Plugin with selection tools and AI-powered editing features.

### Tech Stack
- **Framework**: Lit Web Components with TypeScript
- **UI**: Spectrum Web Components (Adobe's design system)
- **Build Tool**: Vite
- **Testing**: Vitest (unit) + Playwright (e2e)
- **Linting**: ESLint + Prettier

### Project Structure
```
plugin/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ src/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ components/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ common/      # Header, SelectionPanel, AIToolsPanel, etc.
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ panels/      # PluginApp (main panel)
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ utils/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ api/         # AI service, Premiere API, plugin API
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ helpers/     # Validators, formatters
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ types/           # TypeScript definitions
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ styles/          # Global CSS
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ tests/               # Unit and e2e tests
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ public/              # Manifest, index.html, icons
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ bin/                 # Build/utility scripts
```

### Key Features
- Advanced clip selection with time range and track selection
- AI-powered analysis (scene detection, smart cut suggestions)
- Freemium model (10 free AI operations)
- Native Adobe Spectrum UI

### Requirements
- Adobe Premiere Pro 25.6+
- Node.js 20+

What would you like to work on?

Generate a minimal `/update-app` command that updates dependencies and fixes deprecations.

## Step 1: Detect Project Type

Check for config files:
- `package.json` ‚Üí JavaScript/TypeScript (npm/yarn/pnpm/bun)
- `pyproject.toml` or `requirements.txt` ‚Üí Python (pip/poetry)
- `go.mod` ‚Üí Go
- `Cargo.toml` ‚Üí Rust
- `composer.json` ‚Üí PHP

## Step 2: Detect Package Manager

**For JavaScript/TypeScript**: Check for lock files:
- `package-lock.json` ‚Üí npm
- `yarn.lock` ‚Üí yarn
- `pnpm-lock.yaml` ‚Üí pnpm
- `bun.lockb` ‚Üí bun

**For Python**: Check for:
- `poetry.lock` ‚Üí poetry
- Otherwise ‚Üí pip

## Step 3: Generate /update-app Command

Create `.claude/commands/update-app.md`:

```markdown
---
name: update-app
description: Update dependencies, fix deprecations and warnings
---

# Dependency Update & Deprecation Fix

## Step 1: Check for Updates

[INSERT CHECK COMMAND]

## Step 2: Update Dependencies

[INSERT UPDATE COMMAND]

## Step 3: Check for Deprecations & Warnings

Run installation and check output:
[INSERT INSTALL COMMAND]

Read ALL output carefully. Look for:
- Deprecation warnings
- Security vulnerabilities
- Peer dependency warnings
- Breaking changes

## Step 4: Fix Issues

For each warning/deprecation:
1. Research the recommended replacement or fix
2. Update code/dependencies accordingly
3. Re-run installation
4. Verify no warnings remain

## Step 5: Run Quality Checks

[INSERT QUALITY CHECK COMMANDS]

Fix all errors before completing.

## Step 6: Verify Clean Install

Ensure a fresh install works:
1. Delete dependency folders/caches
2. Run clean install
3. Verify ZERO warnings/errors
4. Confirm all dependencies resolve correctly
```

## Step 4: Customize by Project Type

### JavaScript/TypeScript (npm):

```

```

```

yarn audit
```

```
```

### Python (pip):
```markdown
## Step 1: Check for Updates
```bash
pip list --outdated
```

## Step 2: Update Dependencies
```bash
pip install --upgrade -r requirements.txt
```

## Step 3: Check for Deprecations & Warnings
```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

## Step 5: Run Quality Checks
```bash
mypy .
pylint src/
```
```

### Python (poetry):
```markdown
## Step 1: Check for Updates
```bash
poetry show --outdated
```

## Step 2: Update Dependencies
```bash
poetry update
```

## Step 3: Check for Deprecations & Warnings
```bash
poetry install
```
```

### Go:
```markdown
## Step 1: Check for Updates
```bash
go list -u -m all
```

## Step 2: Update Dependencies
```bash
go get -u ./...
go mod tidy
```

## Step 3: Check for Deprecations & Warnings
```bash
go mod download
```

## Step 5: Run Quality Checks
```bash
go vet ./...
gofmt -l .
```
```

### Rust:
```markdown
## Step 1: Check for Updates
```bash
cargo outdated
```

## Step 2: Update Dependencies
```bash
cargo update
```

## Step 3: Check for Deprecations & Warnings
```bash

```

## Step 5: Run Quality Checks
```bash
cargo clippy
cargo fmt --check
```
```
